.. _dashboard.mysql-myisam-aria-metrics:

|mysql| |myisam| |aria| Metrics Dashboard
================================================================================

The |mysql| |myisam| |aria| Metrics dashboard contains statistics about the performance of the |myisam| and |aria| storage engines. This dashboard contains the following metrics:

.. hlist::
   :columns: 2

   - |myisam| indexes
   - |myisam| key buffer performance
   - |myisam| key cache
   - |aria| pagecache reads/writes
   - |aria| transaction log syncs
   - |aria| pagecache blocks

.. include:: .res/replace/name.txt
